column2: Life in Babylon has always been difficult for the Rastafari faithful, and it has only gotten worse in recent times. The Enlightened and the Ras Tafari have been pushed underground, forced to hide themselves from the authorities under penalty of imprisonment or even death, grounding and partaking of holy herb only in private homes and hidden places. One day they will escape to the Promised Land of Ethiope, in the paradise of Africa beyond the sea.
The §YRastafarian§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Rastafarian faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: A High Priest in the Hidden Rastafarian society

Since the Voodoo religion first arrived in the New World, its followers have been persecuted and repressed by corrupt and hypocritical religious authorities. Now, the Voodoo faithful are once again forced to hide their interactions with the spirits until the day comes when they can once more venerate Bondye openly.
The §YVoodoo§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Voodoo faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.

column2: A High Priest in the Hidden Voodoo society

The practice of Lucumí relies on colors, numbers, and gifts - not names. The Orichá have been called by other names before, and if it is necessary to call them by another name now, so be it. The Orichá - or the Saints, if you prefer - can still be propitiated within the context of another religion, even if the rituals themselves must be conducted behind closed doors. It is not the first time this has happened, and probably not the last either, but even so the faithful long for a day when they may venerate Olodumaré and the Orichás openly.
The §YSantería§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Santería faithful have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: A High Priest in the Hidden Santería society

Since the religion of Candomblé first emerged in the New World, its followers have been persecuted and repressed by corrupt and hypocritical religious authorities. Now, the Candomblé faithful are once again forced to hide their devotion to Olodumaré and the Orixás, until the day comes when they can proclaim their faith openly once more.
The §YCandomblé§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: A High Priest in the Hidden Candomblé society

The Tres Potencias and the many courts of María Lionza may be shunned by those who know no better, but the devoted still respect the three powers. In this time of persecution,  and pay special attention to la Corte Libertadora, those mighty spirits lead by Simón Bolívar who fought oppression before and will some day - perhaps some day very soon - help to do so again.
The §YTres Potencias§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

Before Old America won its independence from the Redcoats, true patriots were forced to hide their devotion to the Founding Fathers or be sent to the gallows. Those dark days have descended once again, but true Americanist patriots will not be deterred. They will once again rise up and overthrow the tyrannical rule of their oppressors...
